content.prompt: Which of the following best describes Iranian political culture?

choices.label: It is dominated by sectarian and ethnic divisions.
It is trusting of government and other institutions.
It is prone to political change through referenda.
It values the communityâ€™s welfare above individual rights.
It prefers international law to Islamic law.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
